backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing one text response per principal with functions to submit and check responses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing two Valentine URL slug features with associated frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, hooks, styles, and slug utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color variables for light/dark modes and applying background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component initializing React Query and rendering ValentinePage after path validation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates and animates 20 floating heart icons with randomized positions and timings.
frontend/src/components/SuccessMessage.t: Displays a celebratory success screen with confetti hearts, animations, and personalized text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for checking if a response exists and submitting a new response to the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles, Valentine color palette, fonts, and animation definitions including hearts and button effects.
frontend/src/lib/shareSlug.ts: Defines the canonical slug 'mujhe-to-tu-psnd-hai' and functions for validating Valentine paths and generating share URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinePage.tsx: Implements the interactive Valentine page with playful No-button behavior, animations, rotating excuse texts, response submission, and share/copy logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and Valentine-themed styles.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending requests related to the playful No button and custom share URL.
